name: rb-strptime

about.summary: a fast strptime/strftime engine which uses VM.

script: gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies -n $PREFIX/bin strptime-0.2.5.gem && gem unpack strptime-0.2.5.gem && make -C PREFIX/lib/ruby/gems/2.5.0/gems/strptime-0.2.5/ext/strptime clean

raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "strptime" %}
{% set version = "0.2.5" %}

package:
  name: rb-{{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://rubygems.org/downloads/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
  sha256: 98ed77ff7717a47387ba473614f478e78b162d70a64072fd71d54f547e079af9 

build:
  number: 0
  script:
    - gem install -N -l -V --norc --ignore-dependencies -n $PREFIX/bin {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
      && gem unpack {{ name }}-{{ version }}.gem
      && make -C {{ PREFIX }}/lib/ruby/gems/{{ ruby }}.0/gems/{{ name }}-{{ version }}/ext/{{ name }} clean
  skip: {{ win }}
  skip: True  # [ruby == "2.5" and osx]

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}
  host:
    - ruby
  run:
    - {{ pin_compatible('ruby', max_pin='x.x') }}

test:
  commands:
    - ruby -r {{ name }} -e 'exit 0'

about:
  home: https://rubygems.org/gems/{{ name }}
  license: BSD-2-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: {{ name }}-{{ version }}/LICENSE.txt
  summary: a fast strptime/strftime engine which uses VM.
  doc_url: https://www.rubydoc.info/gems/{{ name }}
  dev_url: https://github.com/nurse/strptime

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - mxr-conda
    - sodre
